var visibleStatus=['entering','entered'];/**
 * Is the given TransitionStatus visible?
 */export var isVisible=function isVisible(status){return visibleStatus.includes(status);};/**
 * Is the given TransitionStatus hidden?
 */export var isHidden=function isHidden(status){return!visibleStatus.includes(status);};/**
 * Forces a reflow to trigger transitions on enter
 */export var reflow=function reflow(node){return node&&node.offsetHeight;};
